title: Frogs
summary: The Frogs tells the story of the god Dionysus, who, despairing of the state of Athens' tragedians, travels to Hades (the underworld) to bring the playwright Euripides back from the dead
author: Aristophanes

title: The Clouds
summary: A Greek comedy play written by the celebrated playwright Aristophanes. A lampooning of intellectual fashions in classical Athens
author: Aristophanes
